title: Turn on max path detection
body: Replace [flag](https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/blob/7b3a457540ab87cf02f6d41ce6095e6ecbbb6ea7/src/Shared/NativeMethodsShared.cs#L477) with runtime check. Leave it on by default. Add an escape hatch to revert back to old max path behaviour. Tests shoulds turn maxpath on so we test that reverting back is still possible.

nodes.body: I don't think we have anything else to do on this.
